item.title: Lesson 6
item.description: Sixth Lesson Welcome to the Sixth lesson - 12/11/2020 9:30 - 12:30 Big Data for Industry 4.0 Teachers: Genoveva Vargas Solar Zoom meeting From 09:30 to 12:30 following this link: (https://grenoble-inp.zoom.us/j/96355699624) (and, if needed, install the zoom app). or you can start the Zoom app with the following information meeting ID: 963 5569 9624 Password: 022868 Collaborative work: Slack channel Class platforms GoogleClassroom page is: (https://classroom.
